thread.section_title: Grand Hotel du Palais Royal - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect in Paris
thread.title_full: Perfect in Paris - Review of Grand Hotel du Palais Royal, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: RICARD O
title: Perfect in Paris
text:
At last, a terrifically located, quiet boutique hotel in central Paris. Staff was excellent and most helpful. Service and room appointments excellent. Only minor complaint was fitness room only had barest of essentials, but that's a minor quibble. Enfin a home in Paris
Room Tip: rooms on small side as is always the case in Europe get a junior suite with a balcony See more room tips
